name: textpattern
title: Textpattern CMS
description: Textpattern is a flexible, elegant and easy-to-use CMS.
author: Team Textpattern

scripts.get-textpacks: rm -rf textpattern/lang/*.txt && curl https://codeload.github.com/textpattern/textpacks/tar.gz/master | tar xz --strip=2 --directory=textpattern/lang textpacks-master/textpacks
scripts.get-hive-admin-theme: rm -rf textpattern/admin-themes/hive* && curl https://codeload.github.com/philwareham/textpattern-hive-admin-theme/tar.gz/master | tar xz --strip=2 --directory=textpattern/admin-themes textpattern-hive-admin-theme-master/dist
